chapter.title: What happens next?
chapter.para: After you sent the upload-id to Univention, a Univention employee will extract your files and copy them to the Test App Center. You'll receive a short note about how to activate the Test App Center for final testing of your app. After the app passed the automatic tests at Univention concerning the packages and you as vendor gave your written approval, the app will be published in the App Center. Due to feedback and further communication the approval process may last a couple of days. Further uploads may be necassary to fix issue that have been found during this iterating process.
